select count(*) from board where title like concat('%',#{search},'%') and content like concat('%',#{search},'%')
and category = #{category}

SELECT b.*, IFNULL(bri.bReply, 0) as bReply FROM ( SELECT bno, case when category = 1 then '공지' when category = 2 then '자유' when category = 3 then '의뢰' end as category, content, title, nick, post_date as postDate, email, bview as bView FROM board where bno = #{bno} ) b LEFT OUTER JOIN ( select bi.bno, count(*) as bReply from board bi inner join board_reply br on bi.bno = br.bno) bri on b.bno = bri.bno

SELECT br.*, IFNULL(brlp.rLikeNum, 0) as rLikeNum FROM ( SELECT replyno, bno, replyforno, email, nick, content, reply_date as replyDate, mno FROM board_reply WHERE bno = 486 ) br LEFT OUTER JOIN (select brl.mno, count(*) as rLikeNum from board_reply_like brl inner join board_reply br on brl.mno = br.mno ) brlp ON br.mno = brlp.mno
